name: Modules.Nfc.MifareTagTechnology
summary: Provides access to MIFARE Ultralight properties and I/O operations on a Modules.Nfc.NfcTag.

methods.name: historicalBytes
methods.summary: The historical bytes extracted from an Answer To Select response.

methods.name: identifier
methods.summary: The unique hardware identifier of the tag.

methods.name: mifareFamily
methods.summary: The MIFARE product family identifier for the tag.

methods.name: sendMiFareCommand
methods.summary: Sends a native MIFARE command to the tag.

parameters.name: data
parameters.summary: hex command with length will be sent in form of data

parameters.name: errorCode
parameters.summary: The error code; only present if an error occurred.

parameters.name: errorDomain
parameters.summary: The error domain; only present if an error occurred.

parameters.name: errorDescription
parameters.summary: The error description; only peresent if an error occurred.

methods.name: sendMiFareISO7816Command
methods.summary: Sends a native MIFARE command to the tag along with other parameter.

parameters.name: data
parameters.summary: hex command with length will be sent in form of data

parameters.name: errorCode
parameters.summary: The error code; only present if an error occurred.

parameters.name: errorDomain
parameters.summary: The error domain; only present if an error occurred.

parameters.name: errorDescription
parameters.summary: The error description; only peresent if an error occurred.
